item.description:
Glamour Girls

   

July 19, 2012

Performing the most popular dance hits from the 40s through the 90s, The Glamour Girls will turn your party or event into an exciting experience. Fronted by the lovely and talented Ginger, Vanessa and Racquel, this group will keep you dancing all night long.

With a show highlighted by costume changes and eye-catching choreography, The Glamour Girls present a song selection ranging from the swing of the 40s ("Glamour Girls Swing" ) to the early 60s Sock Hop to the Motown/Soul era, to the disco dance hits of the 70s, to the pop/rock chart-toppers of the 80s and 90s. Artists covered include The Andrews Sisters, Diana Ross & The Supremes, Aretha Franklin, Sister Sledge, Gloria Gaynor, Madonna, The B-52s, The Bangles and many more

 summer concerts on the green on Thursday nights on the Windsor town green (Broad Street) from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM sponsored by Windsor businesses

 

 

yes look for the red noodle on my chair near fountain
